title: CraftCommand: Collab Hardening & Host Mode Sync
notes: Feature: Introduced 'Host Mode' to toggle multi-user collaboration and user management.
Improved: OperatorChat refined with PFP syncing and removal of automated system tips.
Improved: Centralized version management with version.json as the single source of truth.
Fixed: Resolved stale notification loops and hardened version comparison logic.
Stability: Enhanced SystemContext to dynamically propagate versioning across the UI.
